data.title: Movies For You
data.summary: A react application that gets the latest and upcoming movies that are going to be playing at your theater. You can also search for existing movies and you will get the overview, ratings and the release date of that specific movie. The movie data is fetched from the TMDB API.
data.tech_used: html, css, javascript, bootstrap, sass, react, redux

data.title: Marvel Heros
data.summary: A react application that searches for marvel heroes and villains then returns the latest comics of that hero/villain. The application uses data from the Marvel API.
data.tech_used: html, css, javascript, sass, react, redux

data.title: Recipe Finder
data.summary: A react application that searches for food recipes. It can be based on an ingredient or you can search for the dish name itself. The application uses data from the food2fork API
data.tech_used: html, css, javascript, bootstrap, react, redux

data.title: Pixabay Image Finder
data.summary: A react application that searches for pictures based on the user's input. The pictures are retrieved from the pixabay API

data.title: Portfolio
data.summary: A static porfolio website that showcases a developer skills and projects that he/she was working on

data.title: Man's Bestfriend
data.summary: A react application that looks for pictures of dogs based on the dog's breed. The data is fetched from the Dog API

data.title: ACME Safari
data.summary: A static website that shows a fictional safari in South Africa

data.title: Weather Today
data.summary: A react application that searches for the weather of the location that a user will specify. It uses data that comes from the weather24 API
